Index.youBecomeAClubMember: You become a club member after buying or renting a property in Phuket or Koh Samui. Bonuses called Sabai are awarded for each purchasei. They can be spent on renting a villa and a car, visit to a SPA, boat trips and other concierge services.
Index.review1: I have worked with many real estate companies in Thailand, but only VillaCarte has proved their professionalism and responsibility in practice. They found the perfect property for me and helped me through all the necessary procedures to make my transaction safe and profitable. I am very grateful to VillaCarte and would recommend them to anyone looking for property in Thailand
Index.review2: Being a client of VillaCarte was a real discovery for me - I did not expect that the service and quality of work could be so high. They helped me choose and buy a property in Thailand, and also carried out all the necessary checks and agreement conditions. I recommend VillaCarte to anyone who is looking for a reliable partner to buy property in Thailand

Page.beachClub: Beach club and tennis court within the complex
Page.exclusiveCollection: Exclusive Minor Hotels collection for those who seize life
Page.residence: 42 residences with meticulously designed interiors and modern technologies. The collection includes 17 villas and 25 condominiums ranging from 251 to 829 sqm, offering everything for a comfortable life and relaxation.
Page.complexWhere: The complex is located in Layan Bay, Phuket. The management company is the renowned Minor Hotels network, which owns 530+ residences across six continents. Among them is the premium Anantara hotel with villas in legendary Thai design.
Page.managmentCompany: The developer's management company rents out your apartment, and you receive % of its value under any circumstances. You will have a reliable source of passive income for several years.
Page.managmentCompanyBuilder: The developer's management company groups similar apartments into pools and rents them out, then pays you a % of the total profit, regardless of whether your specific apartment was rented or not.
Page.summary: The cost is divided into several parts. The payment size depends on the stage:
Page.signing: contract signing within 30 days after booking
Page.clearFloor: finished flooring, built-in furniture and painting, window and door frame
Page.registration: plot registration in the land department
Page.approximately: Around this time, your investments can be recouped. This is our forecast: we calculated the period based on the developer's yield programs and our 10 years of experience in the Thailand real estate market.
Page.underManagement: The complex is managed by the international management company Minor Hotels.
Page.averageRating: Its average rating on Booking.com is 9.3. The company manages 550+ hotels in 55 countries. Among them are renowned projects Anantara and Avani in Phuket and Samui. Thanks to such a reliable management company, you'll enhance the value and profitability of the apartments if you decide to rent or sell.
Page.fillForm: Fill out the form — we'll send you a presentation to help you choose a villa or apartment in this complex.
Page.downloadText: By clicking the “Download” button, I agree to the processing of personal data.
Page.minorInternational: Minor International is one of the largest construction companies in the Asia-Pacific region. Since 1978, the developer has created over 530 hotels and resorts, 2540 restaurants, and 282 retail points in 63 countries and regions. The most famous projects in Phuket and Samui are Anantara and Avani.
Page.district1: Bang Tao is the most rapidly developing and popular area of Phuket. It includes the prestigious Laguna area with its own infrastructure, golf courses, and lakes. To the northwest of Bang Tao is the almost untouched by tourists Layan Beach. Here, you can relax under the shade of casuarina trees to the sound of the sea.
Page.district2: The area is constantly evolving, with new luxury complexes being built in resort zones. This makes Bang Tao not only profitable for renting apartments and residences but also comfortable for living with national parks, beaches, entertainment centers, restaurants, and other recreational areas nearby.
Page.verifed: Personally checked and selected the best establishments and places for you near the complex.
